instructions: In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients; mix well. Cover and chill at least 30 minutes or up to 24 hours before serving. Serve with crackers or chips.
ingredients: 1 (7.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and diced
1/2 cup diced Lindsay® Black Ripe Pitted Olives
2 tablespoons light or regular sour cream
title: Artichoke & Black Olive Dip
